html:
Many wonder what’s behind The door
The door to the other side
Some are not even hesitating
They open it early, earlier than expected
It is forbidden you know
Sometimes it brings sorrow
Sometimes a lot of shock
Always there is a mystery
What’s behind the door
And why did they open it so early
Sometimes someone opens it for you
You might not even want it
It bugs humanity since the early days
Some claim they know
Some that there is nothing behind
The door that is always there
title: Door
